titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals an exlusion from gross income for certain amounts of capital gains distributions from regulated investment companies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/30/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude, subject to a $5,000 maximum exclusion (double for a joint return), from gross income a capital gain dividend: (1) which is distributed by a regulated investment company; and (2) which is automatically reinvested by the company in the stock of such company with respect to which the dividend is distributed.
